name: Tank Dungeon Project
description:
You control your tank to destroy the airplanes that appear in the dark.

The project with the purpose of testing the player's experience will then be further invested in the future

Movement: WASD

Skill 1: Space

Skill 2: E

Skill 3: R

Skill SP: Q

Shoot: Mouse Left

Cancel Skill: Mouse Right

If you lose, you can press the pause button and then press the reset button to play again.

Hope you give me the reviews to be able to develop this game better.
